anime.description: Japanese picture book world of the protaganist, You Shoumei`s oil paintings, and author Nakai Nobutomo, they tore out stubbornly this simple composition and sound of the world, "Kaku Nime" production. The existance of earth feels like the inside of a vast painting, through thick and then it continues to the horizon. Excess information is removed. The rain and the breeze are like the expression of one`s feelings. The effective sound of airborn thunder is used. A seeing man`s vision, his hearing, escapes. Parts of the heart`s depths reverberate with the beginning world as it goes. It is the moment for the finished work`s appearance, a work showing of everyone`s tender feelings. Source: Animenfo

tag.name: ganime
tag.description: Ganime label is for the new style of artistic visual content characterized by pictures, words and music to express the artists’ unique perspectives.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: multi-anime projects
tag.description: Many anime are created as part of larger projects encompassing many shows without direct relation to one another. Normally, there is a specific idea in mind: for example, the http://anidb.net/t4859 [Young Animator Training Project] aims to stimulate the on-the-job training of next-generation professionals of the anime industry, whereas the http://anidb.net/t3763 [World Masterpiece Theatre] aims to animate classical stories from all over the world.
